extension.description: It's up to you ;-) As an alternative to .strm files this add-on lets you add streams by adding items to an xml file. Thus giving you a nice list with thumbnails, fanart, and media info if you like.

p2p-Streams addon makes it easy for you to play p2p (peer-to-peer) streams directly in XBMC without the need for external players. Currently supporting Acestream and Sopcast streams it comprises an auto-configuration tool that will download the engines specifically for your platform. At the moment it is available for Linux, Windows and the Raspberry PI (OpenELEC, Raspbmc and Xbian). Other platforms will be supported in the future. Original code for SopCast developed by Cristi - Atlanta; original code for the Acestream Client console provided by NuisMons; Acestream-Engine for the Raspberry Pi based on tarasian666 work; Raspberry PI Sopcast emulator credits go to the amazing community in raspberrypi.org official forum. Fannart and icon by Marquerite. Thanks to them all!
